MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the LL12 postcode area of Wrexham, affecting properties in Gresford and surrounding areas. This is causing reduced power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  6:10PM. Our engineers are on their way to the local area and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:15PM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 6:34PM on 20th March 2021.
